articles.author: David Weber
articles.content:
Western Australia will reintroduce a hard border barring travel from Queensland from midnight tonight. Key points:
  • Only exempt travellers will be allowed to enter WA from Queensland
articles.description: Western Australia's Premier Mark McGowan announces the state will reintroduce a hard border barring travel from Queensland from midnight tonight.
articles.title: WA coronavirus hard border with Queensland to be reimposed after new cases spark lockdown - ABC News

articles.content: Counter Strike: Global Offensive (CSGO) players are being warned of a new scam making the rounds on PC called ‘Fivetown’. This scam is largely localised on Steam, and impacts local players on your fr… [+2142 chars]
articles.description: CSGO players are being warned not to answer suspicious messages after a new scam called 'Fivetown' began filtering through chat.
articles.title: The Latest CSGO Scam Is Called ‘Fivetown’, Here’s How To Avoid It - Kotaku Australia

articles.content: In these strange times, serotonin is a rare and difficult feeling to mine. You need to take the hits of happiness where you can get them. This week, your daily dose of joy comes in the form of a tiny… [+2409 chars]
articles.description: Lil Gator Game is an in-progress indie game starring the cutest little aligator you've ever seen. Anyone who needs serotonin, look within.
articles.title: Lil Gator Is The Wholesome Hero We Need In These Strange Times - Kotaku Australia

articles.author: ABC News
articles.content: The Chief of the Australian Defence Force has joined the military heads of 11 other nations in condemning Myanmar's military junta's involvement in the country's bloodiest day since last month's coup… [+4676 chars]
articles.description: Australia's defence force and 11 other international military heads condemn Myanmar's military junta's use of lethal force that killed more than 100 people, including children.
articles.title: Australia joins international condemnation of Myanmar military junta's killing of civilians - ABC News
